layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x125
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x125
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,16) size 784x94
      LayoutBlockFlow {P} at (0,0) size 784x18
        LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 248x18
          text run at (0,0) width 248: "There should be a green square below:"
      LayoutBlockFlow {DIV} at (15,34) size 754x60
        LayoutBlockFlow {DIV} at (0,0) size 75x60 [bgcolor=#FF0000]
          LayoutBlockFlow {P} at (0,0) size 75x60 [color=#FFFFFF] [bgcolor=#FFFFFF]
            LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 75x15
              text run at (0,0) width 75: "xx xx"
            LayoutInline {SPAN} at (0,0) size 90x30 [color=#008000]
              LayoutText {#text} at (0,15) size 30x30
                text run at (0,15) width 30: "xx"
                text run at (0,30) width 30: "xx"
            LayoutText {#text} at (0,45) size 75x15
              text run at (0,45) width 75: "xx xx"
